entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
